name: Fathom Honduras Travel Fins
description: These compact, lightweight fins are ideal for impromptu snorkel sessions whenever your travels take you near the water. Short enough to fit in your carry-on and significantly lighter than full-size fins, the Honduras Travel Fins still offer high-end features like flow-channeling polycarbonate blades and a highly adjustable foot pocket.Durable thermoplastic construction.Flexible centre panel focuses thrust and increases your swimming efficiency.Soft, comfortable foot pocket.Open heel with adjustable strap accommodates a wide range of foot sizes.Fits in most carry-ons.Dimensions are 20.3 x 17.8cm. 15cm at the tip.Small/Medium fits euro 38-41, Large/XL fits 42-46
